#Text=Korra says : " Hello , Mr. President .

column3:
_	_	_	_
1-5	15-20	Hello	_	_	_	_
1-6	21-22	,	_	_	_	_
1-7	23-26	Mr.	_	_	*->2-1	*[2]
1-8	27-36	President	*	PER	*->2-1	*[2]
1-9	37-38	.	_	_	_	_

#Text=Sir , the Southern Water Tribe -  Raiko says : " Just a second .

column1: #Text=Keep smiling .
#Text=" Raiko says : " Now , how can I help the Avatar and my most generous supporter ?
#Text=" Korra says : " Unalaq 's troops have invaded the South .
#Text=We need you to send the United Forces to help .
#Text=" Raiko says : " I 'm very concerned by what 's happening down there .
#Text=But I do n't think it 's the Republic 's place to interfere with internal Water Tribe matters .
#Text=" Korra says : " Unalaq is n't even the rightful ruler of the Water Tribe .
#Text=He lied his way onto the Northern throne .
#Text=" Varrick says : " Mr. President , the Republic is already involved in this conflict .
#Text=The North attacked our cultural center last night .
#Text=" Raiko says : " Believe me , we are doing everything we can to bring the people responsible to justice .
#Text=" Korra says : " " The people responsible " ?
#Text=Who else would it be but the Northerners ?
#Text=" Raiko says : " Now , I know that when you 're young , it 's hard to keep perspective - " Korra says : " You 're the one who 's lost perspective .
#Text=I 'm trying to save my tribe , and you 're taking pictures .
#Text=" Raiko says : " Sending troops is not something I can do at this time .
#Text=But I promise I will work with Unalaq and the South for a diplomatic solution .
#Text=Now , I 'm sorry , but my mind is made up .
#Text=This meeting is over .
#Text=" Korra says : " My family is going to be wiped out , and it 'll be on your head for doing nothing about it .
#Text=" Korra says : " I ca n't believe the President is doing nothing !
#Text=H - He does n't even care !
#Text=" Mako says : " I 'm sure he cares , but he ca n't just tell his people to go fight a battle at the South Pole that has nothing to do with them .
#Text=" Korra says : " How could you take his side ?
#Text=" Mako says : " What 's with you and sides ?
#Text=Why do you always think I 'm working against you ?
#Text=" Korra says : " Well , you 're not helping me !
#Text=I 'm trying to get troops to the South .
#Text=What are you doing ?
#Text=" Mako says : " I 'm doing my job .
#Text=" Korra says : " Well , excuse me , officer .
#Text=Do n't let me stand in the way of you writing tickets .
#Text=I 'm just trying to save the world .
#Text=" Mako says : " Well , you would n't have to if you did n't keep messing it up !
#Text=" Korra says : " I ca n't talk to you when you 're like this .
#Text=" Mako says : " You 're the one who 's like this !
#Text="
